alert.note: Alert for Mercer (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 12 at 8:51PM CDT until April 14 at 2:20AM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for Spring Creek at Zap affecting Mercer County in North Dakota. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Spring Creek at Zap. * WHEN...Until early Friday morning. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, Right bank overflows-west end of Zap begins to flood. Crop land and county roads flood along creek as well. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 PM CDT Wednesday the stage was 13.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this evening to a crest of 15.0 feet tomorrow morning. It will then begin to fall by Thursday afternoon. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 15.3 feet on 03/22/2019. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
